name: Mana Khemia: Alchemists of Al-Revis
description:
Mana Khemia: Alchemists of Al-Revis is a RPG game developed by Gust. It came out on 21-06-2007. It was published by Nippon Ichi Software.
You can play Mana Khemia: Alchemists of Al-Revis on PlayStation 2.
It was scored by Daisuke Achiwa and Ken Nakagawa.
